title: antivirus app for files cannot be configured due to invalid html
body:
### expected behaviour
admin panel should offer full set of configuration options for antivirus mode and infected file action. the appropriate html should look like this (german language selected):
````html
<select name="av_mode" id="av_mode">
 <option value="executable" selected="selected">ausführbar</option>
 <option value="daemon">dienst</option>
</select>
````

### actual behaviour
admin panel shows empty drop downs (<select>) for antivirus mode and infected file action, due to invalid html. the generated html looks like this:
````html
<select name="av_mode" id="av_mode">
 <option value="executable">ausf&uuml;hrbar</option>
 <option value="daemon" selected="selected">dienst</option>
</select>
````

as a result, both drop-downs "av_mode" and "infected_action" are empty.

### steps to reproduce
1. activate app "antivirus for files 0.3" (internal app)
2. go to the administrator panel
3. check the antivirus configuration section (see image attached)

![oc-av-config](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/4035073/339917/c2cdd6f8-9d41-11e2-91d2-8785ac9c1276.png)

### server configuration
operating system: ubuntu linux 12.04 lts x86_64 inside a virtual root server

web server: apache 2.2.22-1ubuntu1.3

database:mysqlserver 5.5.29-0ubuntu0.12.04.2

php version: php5 5.3.10-1ubuntu3.6

owncloud version: 5.0.3

### client configuration
browser: firefox 20.0

operating system: windows 7 professional 64 bit
